recipe_name: Peach soup with a mascarpone and chocolate chip quenelle
author: Paul Rankin
method: For the soup, place the peach pieces, sugar, lime juice, vanilla pod and water into a small saucepan and bring to the boil.  Cook over a gentle heat for two minutes then remove the vanilla pod (you can save the pod for another occation) and blend until smooth with a hand-held blender. Allow to cool. For the quenelle, mix the mascarpone, cream and chopped chocolate together. To serve, pour the peach soup into a bowl. Using two spoons make a quenelle of the mascarpone mix and place on top of the soup. Scatter over the chopped peach.
ingredients: 1 peach, peeled, stoned and chopped,  55g/2oz caster sugar,  2 limes, juice only,  1 vanilla pod,  splash water,  55g/2oz mascarpone,  2 tbsp double cream,  25g/1oz dark chocolate, chopped,  Â½ peach, finely chopped
